main.leave-confirmation: All unsaved changes will be lost.
main.help-title: If this option is checked, the infobox will take on the title of the article it’s used in. Leaving the option unchecked means you or other users will need to edit the title once the infobox is used on an article page.
main.help-row: A row allows you to add information to your infobox. Use label field to specify the name of the row (like eye color, family, etc.).
main.help-section-header: Header organizes your infobox into sections. Use label field to specify the name of the section (eg. physical description). Each row added under a header will automatically be a part of its section. If you check the “collapsible” option, you will be able to close and open sections when the infobox will be used on an article page.
main.edit-image-item-description: This is a placeholder for an image that you can upload later when the infobox is used on an article page.
main.source-editor-save-confirmation: Do you want to save your changes before going to source editor?
